page.title: 06MY FAMILY
page.content: My dad works for Allen's Transport. He is a lorry driver and has a very big lorry with a bunk bed in it. The lorry is like box at the front and like a trailer at the back, with eight wheels.. My mum is not working at the moment but is looking for a job. My gran is seventy-one and is fit and healthy. My grandad is seventy-two. My home on Irlam road is near the canal and a bus stop. It used to be a very big circle of grass, but is now a bus stop. At home I have lots of games which I play with my younger sister Hazel. My mum likes wearing tight jeans and baggy tops, while my dad likes baggy jeans and tight tops. My mum has curly permed hair and is blond. My dad has black hair.
